titles.title: New York Fair Fishing Act of 2009
To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add New York to the New England Fishery Management Council, and for other purposes.
New York Fair Fishing Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insular Affairs, Oceans and Wildlife.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

bill.summary: New York Fair Fishing Act of 2009 - Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add New York State as a member of the New England Fishery Management Council.
